DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to observe lacrimal fluid condition (tear film break-up time) chronologically after a single dose of AL-43546 ophthalmic products（0.15%, 0.25% and vehicle）and 0.1% sodium hyaluronate ophthalmic solution and compare lacrimal fluid retention time between them.
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Pharmacological Study of AL-43546 Ophthalmic Product in Subjects With Shortened Tear Film Break Up Time
DOC.criteria: Subjects with NIBUT of either eye is 8 seconds or less and other eye is 10 seconds or less at screening test and NIBUT of either eye before instillation in Period I is 10 seconds or less. Diagnosis of severe Sjogren's syndrome (history of the use of punctal plug one time or more, etc.) in either eye. Subjects who will use ophthalmic solutions (excluding the specified artificial tear) or ophthalmic ointment in either eye during the study period.
